func.title: ChangeEffect

param.name: name
param.desc: Name of the effect without preceding 'Fx'. You can use '*' and '?' wildcards.

param.name: target
param.desc: Targt object in which to change effects. With 0, the global effects are processed.

param.name: effect
param.desc: Effect that will be changed. If name is given then the first effect with that name will be changed.

param.name: new_timer
param.desc: New timer interval. If -1, the previous value will be kept. Otherwise, this call will also reset effect time.

func.desc: Changes the name of an effect. This also affects the names of the related callback functions.

example.text: Renames the global effect "MyEffect" (if it exists) to "OtherEffect".
Switches all fire into fast mode.
